rComments: I have no doubt that he knows his stuff, however he could have done a better job demonstrating his knowledge and not copy and pasting the book for lectures. His tests are good, they actually make you apply your knowledge, memorizing won't help. To his credit the class had 11 students who weren't enthusiastic so he wasn't. easy class, good curve etc

He is a great professor.  He is clear in his explanations, open to suggestion, and answers questions better than any econ professor I've had.  His class required some effort and was challenging, but not because his teaching skills were lacking in any way...it's just the nature of the course.  An "A" is possible.

His class is not hard and with a good amount of studying can be passed easily.  His hw is straight out of the book and easy to do.  His midterms are hard only b/c he will put things on them that he doesn't mention in class and can only be found in the book.  Overall, I would recommend taking him.

The teacher tries to make the material clear during lecture. I recommend studying from the book, which is identical to his lectures. Midterms/finals are more in depth than the homework and quizzes, which I find misleading. You will do fine if you read the book faithfully and understand the intuition. Choose another teacher if you must get an A.

ravenna is a very clear speaker despite his accent. i learned alot and the homeworks and quizes are all very reasonable. i did find his midterm and final quite difficult. i only wished he gave us review exams to give us a taste of what to expect for the tests instead of relying on the  TAs. overall with the generous curve, you can still do well.

Ravenna delivers great lectures, but expects a lot from students. If you do not feel like studying, choose another class. he realy makes you understand economics. Now I am very much into it, anad can read financial news.

I would stay away from this professor if possible.  Ravenna is a tough teacher who doesn't seem to care about his students.  His lectures are unclear and exams are extremely difficult.  Avg. on the midterm was a 32/60. Ugh!
hard class, great teacher!if you have to take it, it is worth taking it with him
